oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cigarette card with Gen. Joseph Johnston image
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Booklet manufactured for Duke's Cigarettes, North Carolina. Color lithohgraphs depict a bust portrait of Gen. Joseph E. Johnston, CSA (front) and Confederate soldiers rowing ashore (back). The very small volume is titled "A Short History of Gen'l J. E. Johnston" and is dated 1889. Such cards are also known as trade cards. Donated to TSLA at the Looking Back event.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
